item.description: Save the date - Feb 18th (Saturday) - the big Vermont State rally. I know many of you are busy with Maine this week, so I'll wait until next week to promote it more. We chose a location that's a straight shot up I-89 so we could get as many NH folks up to the rally as possible. We need turnout, turnout, and turnout to show everybody how big a deal this is. We'll be driving media coverage this coming week and next. This is a big-tent event. Come hear Robin Koerner (Blue Republicans) and Chris Lawless talk about Ron Paul, and stay for the other groups too - we're building the future coalition here and focusing on accomplishing at least part of our agenda in the near term. Sign-waving will happen one hour before and after the event on the State House lawn. For today, please give our page (click-through, not this post) a 'Like' and RSVP to the event, to help build momentum. http://www.facebook.c... Oh, and the Vermont Primary is on March 6th. Open Primary, more delegates than NH.
item.name: The Rally for Real Change (Vermont State House)
